name: Dual Wielding
description:
You gain +1 Defense while wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand.

When you attack with one of these weapons and miss, you may immediately make a follow-up attack with the other weapon if it is light, using the same Engagement result as the first attack.

improvements.name: Ambidextrous
improvements.description: You can make the follow-up attack with a melee weapon of any type.

improvements.name: Relentless
improvements.description: You can make the follow-up attack even if the initial attack hits.
